site.embed_html: <iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="facebook" allowfullscreen="" onload="var c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=function(e){style.height=e.data+'px'};contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','https://s9e.github.io',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/facebook.min.html#{$type}{$id}" style="height:360px;width:640px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="gist" allowfullscreen="" onload="var c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=function(e){style.height=e.data+'px'};contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','https://s9e.github.io',[c.port2])" scrolling="" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/gist.min.html#{$id}" style="height:180px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="googleplus" allowfullscreen="" onload="var c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=function(e){style.height=e.data+'px'};contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','https://s9e.github.io',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" style="height:240px;width:450px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/googleplus.min.html#{{ $oid ? $oid : '+' . $name }}/posts/{$pid}"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="imgur" allowfullscreen="" onload="var c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=function(e){var d=e.data.split(' ');style.height=d[0]+'px';style.width=d[1]+'px'};contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','https://s9e.github.io',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" style="height:400px;width:542px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/imgur.min.html#{{ $type=='album' ? 'a/' : '' }}{$id}"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="instagram" allowfullscreen="" onload="var c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=function(e){style.height=e.data+'px'};contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','https://s9e.github.io',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/instagram.min.html#{$id}" style="background:url(https://www.instagram.com/static/images/ico/favicon.svg/fc72dd4bfde8.svg) no-repeat 50% 50% / 50%;height:540px;width:540px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="medium" allowfullscreen="" onload="var c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=function(e){style.height=e.data+'px'};contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','https://s9e.github.io',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/medium.min.html#{$id}" style="height:316px;width:900px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="pinterest" allowfullscreen="" onload="var c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=function(e){style.height=e.data+'px'};contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','https://s9e.github.io',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/pinterest.min.html#{$id}" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2" style="height:360px;width:{{ contains($id,'/') ? '730' : '345' }}px"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="reddit" allowfullscreen="" onload="var c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=function(e){style.height=e.data+'px'};contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','https://s9e.github.io',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/reddit.min.html#{$id}{$path}" style="height:165px;width:800px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="soundcloud" allowfullscreen="" scrolling="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url={{ $playlist_id ? 'https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/' . $playlist_id : ($track_id ? 'https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/' . $track_id . '&secret_token=' . $secret_token : (!contains($id,'://') ? 'https%3A//soundcloud.com/' : '') . $id) }}" style="height:{{ ($playlist_id or contains($id,'/sets/')) ? '450' : '166' }}px;width:900px"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="sporcle" allowfullscreen="" onload="var c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=function(e){style.height=e.data+'px'};contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/sporcle.min.html#{$id}" style="height:535px;width:820px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="telegram" allowfullscreen="" onload="var c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=function(e){style.height=e.data+'px'};contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','https://s9e.github.io',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/telegram.min.html#{$id}" style="height:96px;width:500px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="tumblr" allowfullscreen="" onload="var c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=function(e){style.height=e.data+'px'};contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','https://s9e.github.io',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/tumblr.min.html#{$key}/{$id}" style="height:300px;width:520px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="twitter" allow="autoplay *" allowfullscreen="" onload="var c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=function(e){style.height=e.data+'px'};contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','https://s9e.github.io',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/twitter.min.html#{$id}" style="background:url(https://abs.twimg.com/favicons/favicon.ico) no-repeat 50% 50%;height:250px;width:500px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe>
